about.title: MEET JOSHUA
about.description: My name is Joshua Maurizio and for over 10 years I have been working as a personal trainer in some of the most renowned gyms in Italy (Virgin Active, Hard Candy, Audace Palestre, FitActive, FitExpress, Allenamento Funzionale Milano). I am certified AIPT (ASI-CONI) and Burningate, with specializations in natural bodybuilding, functional training, weight loss, postural and calisthenics. I love accompanying people on a journey of concrete change, through personalized training adapted to every need.

sections.title: My beginning
sections.content: At 18, I decided to change my life and dedicate myself to fitness. A journey made of commitment, discipline and the desire to become my best version.

sections.title: Consistency and determination
sections.content: I continue my fitness journey with consistency and determination, also supported by a nutritionist. A path of balance between training, nutrition and personal growth.

sections.title: Gym and discipline
sections.content: I train in the gym with dedication to build strength, discipline and well-being. Every day a step forward towards my goals.

sections.title: Discovery of Calisthenics
sections.content: I practice Calisthenics to develop strength, body control and agility. Consistent training and passion to overcome my limits every day.

sections.title: Training with friends
sections.content: I practice Calisthenics in the park with friends, combining training and fun. Every session is an opportunity to grow, improve and meet new passionate people.

sections.title: Continuous improvement
sections.content: I constantly improve thanks to well-programmed Calisthenics workouts and the support of a quality nutritionist. A studied path to maximize results, strength and well-being.

sections.title: Couple fitness
sections.content: I share my passion for fitness with my soulmate, between workouts and growing together. A journey of strength, motivation and fun shared day after day.

sections.title: New collaboration
sections.content: I start a new work collaboration with my partner, combining professionalism and harmony. Together we transform ideas into concrete projects, with passion and determination.

sections.title: Personal trainer - Weight training
sections.content: After years of weight training and working as a personal trainer, I have transformed my passion into concrete experience. Today I combine competence and dedication to help others achieve their goals.

sections.title: Personal trainer - Calisthenics
sections.content: After years of Calisthenics and experience as a personal trainer, I have transformed passion into competence. Today I help others grow and achieve their goals with method and dedication.

sections.title: Experience and knowledge
sections.content: After years of fitness studies and training of all kinds, I have transformed passion into concrete experience. Today I combine knowledge and practice to obtain effective and lasting results.

services.title: Discover my services
services.selectService: Click on a service to view details
services.selectDateTime: Select your preferred date and time

personal.title: 1-to-1 Training
personal.description:
Personalized 1-to-1 training designed just for you: focus on goals, technique correction and constant motivation.
An exclusive journey to maximize results in safety and effectiveness.

calisthenics.title: Calisthenics & Functional Service
calisthenics.description:
Calisthenics and Functional training to develop strength, mobility and body control.
A dynamic mix that improves performance, endurance and 360¬∞ fitness.

bodybuilding.title: Bodybuilding & Performance Service
bodybuilding.description:
Bodybuilding and Performance to build muscle mass, power and definition.
A targeted approach to increase strength, aesthetics and athletic performance.

groupClasses.title: Group Classes Service
groupClasses.description:
Energetic and motivating group classes to train while having fun together.
A mix of dynamism, sociability and results, suitable for every fitness level.

onlineCoaching.title: Online Coaching Service
onlineCoaching.description:
Tailored online coaching with personalized programs and constant support wherever you are.
Train with flexibility and achieve your goals with the guidance of a professional.

booking.title: Book your consultation
booking.description: Select your preferred date and time for your free consultation.
booking.note: During the introductory call, we'll arrange when to meet for the first time at the gym.

feedback.title: Weekly Check-in
feedback.subtitle: Complete this brief check-in to help me monitor your progress
feedback.formSubtitle: Complete this brief check-in to help me monitor your progress.
feedback.noFeedbacksMessage: Your check-ins will appear here when you submit one.

status.canSubmit: It's time to complete your check-in!
status.canSubmitMessage: It's been a week since your last training plan update. Your check-in will help me monitor your progress.
status.noPlanMessage: The weekly check-in will be available one week after you receive your training plan.
status.tooSoonMessage: The weekly check-in will be available one week after your last training plan update.
status.tooSoonSinceLastMessage: You can submit a new check-in two weeks after your last one. Thank you for your participation!
status.alreadySubmittedMessage: You've already submitted your check-in for the current training plan. You can submit another one after the next plan update.

form.submittedSuccess: Your check-in has been submitted successfully. Your answers will help me monitor your progress.
form.closingMessage: Thank you for your time! Your check-in is essential to help me support you better.

checkin.energyLevel: How would you rate your overall energy this week?
checkin.workoutsCompleted: Did you complete all scheduled workouts?
checkin.mealPlanFollowed: Did you follow the meal plan?
checkin.sleepQuality: How would you rate your sleep quality?
checkin.physicalDiscomfort: Did you experience any pain or physical discomfort during workouts?
checkin.motivationLevel: How would you rate your overall motivation?
checkin.weeklyHighlights: What went particularly well this week?
checkin.weeklyHighlightsPlaceholder: Share what went well this week...
checkin.currentWeight: What is your current weight (in kg)?
